room_title: Escape room "Bait Shop" by Crystal River Room Escape in Crystal River
room_address: 8740 Mayo Drive Suite #5 Crystal River, FL 34429
room_description: Welcome to Toothless Bob’s Baits – Lonnie (AKA Banjo Boy) is his hired hand. You have stopped in today to buy bait for a fishing trip you have planned. To your surprise, no one is here, but what you don’t know is that Toothless Bob and his Backwoods crew are baiting you. You have an hour to solve all the clues and riddles, unlock all the locks, find the key to the door and get out before Bob and the Backwoods boys catch you and make you squeal like a pig!
